## Experimental.ExtendedArray.isExtendedArray() method

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Type guard to determine if some arbitrary array is an [Experimental.ExtendedArray](./ts-extras.experimental.extendedarray.md)

**Signature:**

```typescript
static isExtendedArray<T>(a?: T[]): a is ExtendedArray<T>;
```

**Returns:**

a is [ExtendedArray](./ts-extras.experimental.extendedarray.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt;

Returns `true` if `a` is an [ExtendedArray](./ts-extras.experimental.extendedarray.md)<!-- -->, `false` otherwise.
